title: AI-PRACNS
name: AI-Powered Resource Allocation for Cloud and Network Systems
description: Designed and implemented a comprehensive intelligent routing system for SAGSINs. Utilizes Reinforcement Learning for dynamic, multi-objective resource allocation, contrasting performance against Dijkstra under severe network conditions.
responsibilities: Architected and implemented the core multi-layered system (Simulation, Network, AI, Management) using Java Spring Boot and Python microservices.
Developed the RL Agent (DQN) in PyTorch to generate optimal routing paths based on real-time metrics (queue occupancy, link status).
Designed and implemented socket programming (TCP/UDP) and multithreading for packet transmission and real-time state synchronization across all network nodes (LEO, MEO, GEO).
Built the Streamlit-based Simulation Client for real-time visualization and comparative analysis of RL vs. Dijkstra performance.
Managed network configurations via sagsins-core-service and MongoDB, and integrated Cesium API for 3D orbital visualization on React UI.

title: DOMICARE
name: Cleaning Service Website
description: DomiCare is a Web API platform for managing and booking cleaning services with role-based access for customers, sales staff, and administrators.
responsibilities: Designed and implemented the cloud-based database using Railway Postgres.
Secured the system with JWT, Spring Security, SSL Certificate, and OAuth2.
Integrated Email Service for verification and notification.
Implemented WebSocket for real-time features like live updates and notifications.
Designed and developed RESTful APIs for full CRUD operations using three-layer architecture.
Dockerized the application and deployed it on Render.
